attributes.action: Grant a posthumous Knghthood to the late Bob Crampsey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, urge the prime Minister to grant a posthumous Knighthood to the late journalist and sports broadcaster, Bob Crampsey.

In an age when lesser lights seem to be awarded titles and awards for fleeting contributions and superficial ‘glories’, it is disappointing that a man such as Bob Crampsey, who gave a lifetime’s public service in the areas of teaching, journalism and sports broadcasting, and who was universally regarded as one of life’s true gentlemen, was overlooked for a civic award in his lifetime.

We urge the Prime Minster, as a well-known fan of the Scottish game, to right this wrong, and to grant Bob Crampsey a posthumous Knighthood.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
